title: The Story of an immigrant filmmaker
creator_credit: Agnes Karlik and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Agnes was separated from her mother and sisters when she migrated from post war Europe with her father. Her father was a filmmaker and documents their journey on the ship and their arrival to a transit camp in Western Australia. This story uses the footage captured by her father to tell her tale of migration.
